subject: RE: [junit] Compiling JUnit in Eclipse
msgSnippet: Hi rsarva80, I just was going through a backlog of messages of the TestNg forum when I came across a posting that is about a similar issue.  Maybe that can
messageBody:
Hi rsarva80,

I just was going through a backlog of messages of the TestNg forum when I came across a posting that is about a similar issue. Maybe that can help you solving your package problem, which sounds to me like a configuration problem.

http://forums.opensymphony.com/thread.jspa?threadID=34946&messageID=68487#68487

Hope that helps.

Andreas



________________________________________
From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of rsarva80
Sent: Wednesday, June 21, 2006 7:07 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Compiling JUnit in Eclipse

The purpose for which I am using JUnit is slightly different.
I am using a Code Analyser(CAP)-to analyse the source code of the
JUnit project.

I downloaded JUnit from the http://www.junit.org/index.htm,unzipped
it in c:junit and then imported the JUnit project into eclipse.

When I tried running the project(run tests button),Eclipse reports
error in each n every file of the project..

For the files listed under:junit.framework

the error messages:

package junit.tests.framework
The declared package does not match the expected package
Junit.framework

for files listed under junit.tests

error:junit.textui cannot be resolved

What could be the problem?Please help.
